description: Your tastebuds are in for a treat with this vibrant and creamy blackberry frozen yoghurt. All you need is 3 ingredients to make this eye-catching dessert.
name: Easy Blackberry Frozen Yoghurt Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Stand frozen yoghurt at room temperature for 10 minutes. Halve remaining blackberries lengthways. Scoop frozen yoghurt into bowls and serve with blackberries (see Tip).
